project_short_name.description: Project name abbreviation; the program name appended with a project name abbreviation; eg. TCGA-OV, etc.

primary_site.description: Anatomical site of the cancer under investigation or review

Hugo_Symbol.description: HUGO symbol for the gene (HUGO symbols are always in all caps). Unknown is used for regions that do not correspond to a gene

Entrez_Gene_Id.description: Entrez gene ID (an integer). 0 is used for regions that do not correspond to a gene region or Ensembl ID

Center.description: One or more genome sequencing center reporting the variant

NCBI_Build.description: The reference genome used for the alignment (GRCh38)

Chromosome.description: Chromosome, possible values: chr1-22, and chrX

Start_Position.description: Lowest numeric position of the reported variant on the genomic reference sequence. Mutation start coordinate

End_Position.description: Highest numeric genomic position of the reported variant on the genomic reference sequence. Mutation end coordinate

Strand.description: Either + or - to denote whether read mapped to the sense (+) or anti-sense (-) strand

Variant_Type.description: Type of mutation. TNP (tri-nucleotide polymorphism) is analogous to DNP (di-nucleotide polymorphism) but for three consecutive nucleotides. ONP (oligo-nucleotide polymorphism) is analogous to TNP but for consecutive runs of four or more (SNP, DNP, TNP, ONP, INS, DEL, or Consolidated)

Reference_Allele.description: The plus strand reference allele at this position. Includes the deleted sequence for a deletion or - for an insertion

Tumor_Seq_Allele1.description: Primary data genotype for tumor sequencing (discovery) allele 1. A - symbol for a deletion represents a variant. A - symbol for an insertion represents wild-type allele. Novel inserted sequence for insertion does not include flanking reference bases

Tumor_Seq_Allele2.description: Primary data genotype for tumor sequencing (discovery) allele 2. A - symbol for a deletion represents a variant. A - symbol for an insertion represents wild-type allele. Novel inserted sequence for insertion does not include flanking reference bases

dbSNP_RS.description: The rs-IDs from the   dbSNP database, novel if not found in any database used, or null if there is no dbSNP record, but it is found in other databases

dbSNP_Val_Status.description: The dbSNP validation status is reported as a semicolon-separated list of statuses. The union of all rs-IDs is taken when there are multiple

Tumor_Aliquot_Barcode.description: Aliquot barcode for the tumor sample

Matched_Norm_Aliquot_Barcode.description: Aliquot barcode for the matched normal sample

Match_Norm_Seq_Allele1.description: Primary data genotype. Matched normal sequencing allele 1. A - symbol for a deletion represents a variant. A - symbol for an insertion represents wild-type allele. Novel inserted sequence for insertion does not include flanking reference bases (cleared in somatic MAF)

Tumor_Validation_Allele1.description: Secondary data from orthogonal technology. Tumor genotyping (validation) for allele 1. A - symbol for a deletion represents a variant. A - symbol for an insertion represents wild-type allele. Novel inserted sequence for insertion does not include flanking reference bases

Tumor_Validation_Allele2.description: Secondary data from orthogonal technology. Tumor genotyping (validation) for allele 2

Match_Norm_Validation_Allele1.description: Secondary data from orthogonal technology. Matched normal genotyping (validation) for allele 1. A - symbol for a deletion represents a variant. A - symbol for an insertion represents wild-type allele. Novel inserted sequence for insertion does not include flanking reference bases (cleared in somatic MAF)

Match_Norm_Validation_Allele2.description: Secondary data from orthogonal technology. Matched normal genotyping (validation) for allele 2 (cleared in somatic MAF)

Verification_Status.description: Second pass results from independent attempt using same methods as primary data source. Generally reserved for 3730 Sanger Sequencing

Validation_Status.description: Second pass results from orthogonal technology

Mutation_Status.description: An assessment of the mutation as somatic, germline, LOH, post transcriptional modification, unknown, or none. The values allowed in this field are constrained by the value in the Validation_Status field

Sequencing_Phase.description: TCGA sequencing phase (if applicable). Phase should change under any circumstance that the targets under consideration change

Sequence_Source.description: Molecular assay type used to produce the analytes used for sequencing. Allowed values are a subset of the SRA 1.5 library_strategy field values. This subset matches those used at CGHub

Validation_Method.description: The assay platforms used for the validation call

Sequencer.description: Instrument used to produce primary sequence data

Tumor_Aliquot_UUID.description: Unique GDC identifier for tumor aliquot (10189 unique)

Matched_Norm_Aliquot_UUID.description: Unique GDC identifier for normal aliquot (10189 unique)

HGVSc.description: The coding sequence of the variant in HGVS recommended format

HGVSp.description: The protein sequence of the variant in HGVS recommended format. p.= signifies no change in the protein

HGVSp_Short.description: Same as the HGVSp column, but using 1-letter amino-acid codes

Transcript_ID.description: Ensembl ID of the transcript affected by the variant

Exon_Number.description: The exon number (out of total number)

t_depth.description: Read depth across this locus in tumor BAM

t_ref_count.description: Read depth supporting the reference allele in tumor BAM

t_alt_count.description: Read depth supporting the variant allele in tumor BAM

n_depth.description: Read depth across this locus in normal BAM

n_ref_count.description: Read depth supporting the reference allele in normal BAM (cleared in somatic MAF)

n_alt_count.description: Read depth supporting the variant allele in normal BAM (cleared in somatic MAF)

all_effects.description: A semicolon delimited list of all possible variant effects, sorted by priority ([Symbol,Consequence,HGVSp_Short,Transcript_ID,RefSeq,HGVSc,Impact,Canonical,Sift,PolyPhen,Strand])

Allele.description: The variant allele used to calculate the consequence

Gene.description: The gene symbol. In this table, gene symbol is gene name e.g. ACADVL

Feature.description: Stable Ensembl ID of feature (transcript, regulatory, motif)

Feature_type.description: Type of feature. Currently one of Transcript, RegulatoryFeature, MotifFeature (or blank)

One_Consequence.description: The single consequence of the canonical transcript in  sequence ontology terms, eg missense_variant

Consequence.description: Consequence type of this variant; sequence ontology terms

cDNA_position.description: Relative position of base pair in the cDNA sequence as a fraction. A - symbol is displayed as the numerator if the variant does not appear in cDNA

CDS_position.description: Relative position of base pair in coding sequence. A - symbol is displayed as the numerator if the variant does not appear in coding sequence

Protein_position.description: Relative position of affected amino acid in protein. A - symbol is displayed as the numerator if the variant does not appear in coding sequence

Amino_acids.description: Amino acid substitution caused by the mutation. Only given if the variation affects the protein-coding sequence

Codons.description: The alternative codons with the variant base in upper case

DISTANCE.description: Shortest distance from the variant to transcript

TRANSCRIPT_STRAND.description: The DNA strand (1 or -1) on which the transcript/feature lies

SYMBOL.description: Eg TP53, LRP1B, etc (same as Hugo_Symbol field except blank instead of Unknown

SYMBOL_SOURCE.description: The source of the gene symbol, usually HGNC, rarely blank, other sources include Uniprot_gn, EntrezGene, etc

HGNC_ID.description: Gene identifier from the HUGO Gene Nomenclature Committee if applicable

CANONICAL.description: A flag (YES) indicating that the VEP-based canonical transcript, the longest translation, was used for this gene. If not, the value is null

CCDS.description: The  CCDS identifier for this transcript, where applicable

ENSP.description: The Ensembl protein identifier of the affected transcript

MANE.description: MANE (Matched Annotation by NCBI and EMBL-EBI) Transcript

APPRIS.description: Annotates alternatively spliced transcripts as primary or alternate based on a range of computational methods

SIFT.description: The SIFT prediction and/or score, with both given as prediction (score)

EXON.description: The exon number (out of total number)

INTRON.description: The intron number (out of total number)

DOMAINS.description: The source and identifier of any overlapping protein domains

ThousG_AF.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes

ThousG_AFR_AF.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined African population

ThousG_AMR_AF.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined American population

ThousG_EAS_AF.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined East Asian population

ThousG_EUR_AF.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined European population

ThousG_SAS_AF.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined South Asian population

ESP_AA_AF.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in NHLBI-ESP African American population

ESP_EA_AF.description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in NHLBI-ESP European American population

gnomAD_AF.description: Frequency of existing variant in gnomAD exomes combined population

gnomAD_AFR_AF.description: Frequency of existing variant in gnomAD exomes African/American population

gnomAD_AMR_AF.description: Frequency of existing variant in gnomAD exomes American population

gnomAD_ASJ_AF.description: Frequency of existing variant in gnomAD exomes Ashkenazi Jewish population

gnomAD_EAS_AF.description: Frequency of existing variant in gnomAD exomes East Asian population

gnomAD_FIN_AF.description: Frequency of existing variant in gnomAD exomes Finnish population

gnomAD_NFE_AF.description: tFrequency of existing variant in gnomAD exomes Non-Finnish European population

gnomAD_OTH_AF.description: Frequency of existing variant in gnomAD exomes other combined population

gnomAD_SAS_AF.description: Frequency of existing variant in gnomAD exomes South Asian population

MAX_AF.description: Maximum observed allele frequency in 1000 Genomes, ESP and ExAC/gnomAD

MAX_AF_POPS.description: Populations in which maximum allele frequency was observed

gnomAD_non_cancer_AF.description: Frequency of exisiting variant in gnomAD genomes combined non-cancer population

gnomAD_non_cancer_AFR_AF.description: Frequency of exisiting variant in gnomAD genomes non-cancer African/American population

gnomAD_non_cancer_AMI_AF.description: Frequency of exisiting variant in gnomAD genomes non-cancer Amish population

gnomAD_non_cancer_AMR_AF.description: Frequency of exisiting variant in gnomAD genomes non-cancer Latino population

gnomAD_non_cancer_ASJ_AF.description: Frequency of exisiting variant in gnomAD genomes non-cancer Ashkenazi Jewish population

gnomAD_non_cancer_EAS_AF.description: Frequency of exisiting variant in gnomAD genomes non-cancer East Asian population

gnomAD_non_cancer_FIN_AF.description: Frequency of exisiting variant in gnomAD genomes non-cancer Finnish population

gnomAD_non_cancer_MID_AF.description: Frequency of exisiting variant in gnomAD genomes non-cancer Middle Eastern population

gnomAD_non_cancer_NFE_AF.description: Frequency of exisiting variant in gnomAD genomes non-cancer Non-Finnish European population

gnomAD_non_cancer_OTH_AF.description: Frequency of exisiting variant in gnomAD genomes non-cancer Other population

gnomAD_non_cancer_SAS_AF.description: Frequency of exisiting variant in gnomAD genomes non-cancer South Asian population

gnomAD_non_cancer_MAX_AF_adj.description: Maximum observed allele frequency in non-cancer gnomAD genomes populations after removing subpopulations with less than 2 allele counts

gnomAD_non_cancer_MAX_AF_POPS_adj.description: Non-cancer gnomAD genomes populations in which the maximum allele frequency was observed after removing those with less than 2 allele counts

CLIN_SIG.description: Clinical significance of variant from dbSNP

SOMATIC.description: Somatic status of each ID reported under Existing_variation (0, 1, or null)

PUBMED.description: Pubmed ID(s) of publications that cite existing variant

TRANSCRIPTION_FACTORS.description: List of transcription factors which bind to the transcription factor binding profile

MOTIF_NAME.description: The source and identifier of a transcription factor binding profile aligned at this position

MOTIF_POS.description: The relative position of the variation in the aligned TFBP

HIGH_INF_POS.description: A flag indicating if the variant falls in a high information position of a transcription factor binding profile (TFBP) (Y, N, or null)

MOTIF_SCORE_CHANGE.description: The difference in motif score of the reference and variant sequences for the TFBP

miRNA.description: SO terms of overlapped miRNA secondary structure feature(s)

IMPACT.description: The impact modifier for the consequence type

PICK.description: Indicates if this block of consequence data was picked by VEP's   pick feature (1 or null)

TSL.description: Transcript support level, which is based on independent RNA analyses

HGVS_OFFSET.description: Indicates by how many bases the HGVS notations for this variant have been shifted

PHENO.description: Indicates if existing variant is associated with a phenotype, disease or trait (0, 1, or null)

GENE_PHENO.description: Indicates if gene that the variant maps to is associated with a phenotype, disease or trait (0, 1, or null)

CONTEXT.description: The reference allele per VCF specs, and its five flanking base pairs

tumor_submitter_uuid.description: Unique GDC identifier for the tumor file submitter

normal_submitter_uuid.description: Unique GDC identifier for the normal file submitter

case_id.description: Unique GDC identifier for the underlying case

GDC_FILTER.description: GDC filters applied universally across all MAFs

hotspot.description: A flag indicating if the variant is a known hotspot (Y, N, or null)

RNA_Support.description: Indicates if the variant is found and alleles (Match), simply (Overlap), or is not supported (No) by tumor RNA-Seq. If it has not been checked against RNA-Seq data, the value will be 'Unknown'.

RNA_depth.description: Read depth at this locus if the variant is supported by tumor RNA-seq data.

RNA_ref_count.description: Read depth supporting the reference allele at this locus if the variant is supported by tumor RNA-seq data.

RNA_alt_count.description: Read depth supporting the variant allele at this locus if the variant is supported by tumor RNA-seq data.

callers.description: |-delimited list of mutation caller(s) that agreed on this particular call, always in alphabetical order: muse, mutect, somaticsniper, varscan

file_gdc_id.description: |-delimited list of unique GDC identifiers for underlying MAF file

muse.description: Muse caller identified the variant at this position

mutect2.description: Mutect2 caller identified the variant at this position

pindel.description: pindel caller identified the variant at this position

somaticsniper.description: Somaticsniper caller identified the variant at this position

varscan2.description: Varscan2 caller identified the variant at this position

sample_barcode_tumor.description: TCGA sample barcode for the tumor, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A. One sample may have multiple sets of CN segmentations corresponding to multiple aliquots; use GROUP BY appropriately in queries

sample_barcode_normal.description: TCGA sample barcode for the normal control, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A. One sample may have multiple sets of CN segmentations corresponding to multiple aliquots; use GROUP BY appropriately in queries

aliquot_barcode_tumor.description: TCGA aliquot barcode for the tumor, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A-01D-0517-01

aliquot_barcode_normal.description: TCGA aliquot barcode for the normal control, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A-01D-0517-01]
